VirtualSRV.com specializes in quality and affordable VPS hosting. Check out our site: http://www.virtualsrv.com.

Our offer includes powerful hardware, blazing fast connectivity, friendly support, low prices and instant set up!

------------------------------------------------
::All VirtualSRV VPS Plans include::
------------------------------------------------

-SolusVM Control Panel
-Fast OpenVZ Virtualization
-Full Root Access
-Instant Setup
-Reverse DNS
-Ability to use Tun/Tap device
-99.9% Network Uptime
-Supermicro Hardware
-Unlimited OS Reloads
-Low Customer/Node Ratio (No Overselling)
-SSL Protected Cart
-Uptime Monitoring
-Helpful Support
-Choice of Phoenix or Chicago DC
